heading: I'm not just another agent. I'm your upgrade planner.
subtext: I only work with HDB owners upgrading to condos in East Singapore. That focus means I can offer things most agents can't:

features.title: Ground-level knowledge you won't find online
features.description: Off-market listings, which units to avoid, hyperlocal insights from 13 years in the East.

features.title: Seamless transitions, even without 5% deposit
